title: ADC tier list.
body:
**Godlike**.
Kalista.
Jinx.
Corki.

**Good**.
Ezreal.
Graves.
Varus.
Kog'Maw.
Lucian.
Draven.
Caitlyn.

**Balanced**.
Miss Fortune.

**Sub-Tier**.
Vayne.
Twitch.
Tristina.
Ashe.
Sivir.

**Why-Does-This-Bitch-Have-A-Blind Tier**. (like honestly, no ADC should have a blind.
Quinn.

**Urgot Tier**.
Urgot.

There you go, Kalista, Corki and Jinx are the only viable ADC's atm.

replies.body: Bronze trash downvoting my high-quality and accurate list.

> [{quoted}](name=EzeBlood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=f5U0Hfia,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-04-15T00:14:13.379+0000)
>
> you are a fucking retard...

Nice silver icon, your opinion is not wanted here trash.
Nice level 27, I'd like to see you reach silver in 5 games.

Your sub tier section is subpar.

And Urgod is not an adc, nor is Quinn.

And you really need some changes on the good and balanced tier

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=f5U0Hfia,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-04-15T04:17:47.545+0000)
>
> Your sub tier section is subpar.
> 
> And Urgod is not an adc, nor is Quinn.
> 
> And you really need some changes on the good and balanced tier

They are they just suck at the role, but Riot caved in to the bronze trash and buffed Quinn, now she can win botlane by spamming her shit blind at balanced ADC's like Miss Fortune has no hard CC.
Sivir Sub-Tier? Is that why she is currently the 2nd highest ADC in win rate % across all tiers?

> [{quoted}](name=Condescend,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=f5U0Hfia,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-04-15T01:11:12.009+0000)
>
> Sivir Sub-Tier? Is that why she is currently the 2nd highest ADC in win rate % across all tiers?

She's a trash pick, Kalista laneclears better anyway.
the fuq you say about me?

trist?
twitch?
sivir?
ashe?

exqueeze me?

I agree for yolo Q siv and ashe just cant duke it out against higher mob ADCs but nobody stuns a team like an ashe skillshot and nobody AOE shreds a team like sivir. In a team game where people aren't retarded siv dominates.

> Why-Does-This-Bitch-Have-A-Blind Tier. (like honestly, no ADC should have a blind.
Quinn.

Because it works. Point and case: this thread.

Why the hell is sivir in sub-tier when she is one of the most potent marksmen at the point in time. Her spell shield and great ultimate followed up by the righteous glory meta on tanks creates amazing engage for fights. Kalistas rend stacks do almost nothing in the current tank meta unless she gets many stacks on her tank target. Ashe is growing in the meta as well because of having that long range engage which allows her to not have to get to the tanks which can lock her down. Although Ashe lacks mobility her kite potential is amazing against the tank meta. Corki isn't all that strong currently because like Kog maw. He's more of a poke Adc and sitting on those tri-force procks. And btw if theyre god tier it doesn't mean that they are the only adcs viable currently. Any Adc can do good in its job if the player has enough skill. Even Urgot is being played in the LCS at the current point in time, even though being regarded by millions by the "worst champion in the game"

â€”Riso
